name: Palm Valley Animal Center
description: Palm Valley Animal Center is the only full service, open admission, animal intake facility in all of Hidalgo County. Receiving nearly 32,000 animals a year we are one of the largest single intake facilities in the nation. We service the majority of Hidalgo County and more than 750,000 residents.

name: Doctors Hospital At Renaissance
description: At Doctors Hospital at Renaissance we have programs specifically designed for adults, college and high school students in which you will have an opportunity to help others and gain knowledge in the medical field.

name: McAllen Medical Center
description: If you have four hours a week to make a difference in someoneâ€™s life, please join the South Texas Health System Volunteer Organizations.

contactUs.name: Volunteer Services
contactUs.title: The South Texas Health System Volunteer Department

name: Rio Grande Regional Hospital
description: Nearly 200 adults from 19-95 years of age give generously of their time and talent to provide service to Rio Grande Regional Hospital. From answering telephones to assisting at the information desks and from working in the gift shop, selling popcorn, to offering assistance in patient care areas, our Volunteers are everywhere!

contactUs.title: The South Texas Health System Volunteer Department

name: Mission Regional Medical Center
description: The Mission Regional Medical Center Auxiliary Volunteers are members of the Texas Association of Healthcare Volunteers and are a part of a growing number of individuals who seek areas to help our local community families. If interested in Volunteering at Mission Regional Medical Center, please pick up an application at our Gift Shop.
